◆ templated_for_t()

template<template< sz index__ > typename f_type_t__, sz begin__, sz end__, typename... arg_types__>
void ncpp::utilities::templated_for_t ( arg_types__ &&...  args)
inline

The function template helping run a loop which the index__ be a template argument.

Parameters
<f_type_t__>the struct template that has the only one template argument <index__> and the invoke(args...) function.
<begin__>the integer representing the begin__ of the loop
<end__>the integer representing the end__ of the loop
<arg_types__...>types of each argument in the invoke function
args...the arguments forwarding to invoke function
